DEVICES.NOT_FOUND_DEVICE_BY_IDENTIFIER_ERROR_MES: Cannot resolve the specified connected device by the provided index or identifier. To list currently connected devices and verify that the specified index or identifier exists, run '%s device'.

DEVICES.NOT_FOUND_DEVICE_BY_INDEX_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not find device by specified index %d. To list currently connected devices and verify that the specified index exists, run '%s device'.
